format: Markdown (with embedded code snippets and HTML annotations)
description: Documentation page describing computed properties in a component-based framework, including defining computed properties and their reactivity.

methods.name: offset
methods.description: A computed property function that returns the value of `index` multiplied by 100.

methods.name: bgColor
methods.description: A computed property function that returns 'aqua' if `focused` is true, otherwise '#ccc'.
